markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Barding of the Zephyr](/Equipment.aspx?ID=403)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Companion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=29" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Primal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=134" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 604 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 900 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn barding

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This light barding is covered in stylized wind motifs. When you suit up your animal companion, the barding adjusts to fit your animal companion regardless of its shape.

 When your companion falls, wind picks it up from below; it gains the effects of [_feather fall_](/Spells.aspx?ID=111).

<document level="2" id="action-230" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Barding of the Zephyr
